# Liquidity Sprint Board

Kanban for the current sprint. Move cards left→right as evidence and wiring progress.

## Immediate (this week)

- [ ] [Asset name] — Owner: [name] — Target: [YYYY-MM-DD]
  - Why now: TTC=[x], LTV=[x], LD=[x], CC=[x], VF=[x]; composite=[xx.xx]
  - Path to cash: [1–2 bullets]

- [ ] [Asset name] — Owner: [name] — Target: [YYYY-MM-DD]
  - Why now: [...]
  - Path to cash: [...]

## Near-Term (2–4 weeks)

- [ ] [Asset name] — Owner: [name]
  - Unlocks: [x], [y], [z]
  - Move-to-Immediate when: [criteria]

## Background (cheap progress only)

- [ ] [Asset name]
  - Cheap tasks: [x], [y]

## Blocked

- [ ] [Asset name] — Blocker: [reason]

## Done (closed this sprint)

- [x] [Asset name] — Date wired: [YYYY-MM-DD]
